org.apache.flink.api.java

类 ScalaShellRemoteEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.java.ExecutionEnvironment
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.RemoteEnvironment
        • org.apache.flink.api.java.ScalaShellRemoteEnvironment

  • public class ScalaShellRemoteEnvironment
extends RemoteEnvironment
    Special version of RemoteEnvironment that has a reference to a org.apache.flink.api.scala.FlinkILoop. When execute is called this will use the reference of the ILoop to write the compiled classes of the current session to a Jar file and submit these with the program.

    • 字段详细资料

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ScalaShellRemoteEnvironment

        public ScalaShellRemoteEnvironment(java.lang.String host,
                                   int port,
                                   FlinkILoop flinkILoop,
                                   Configuration clientConfig,
                                   java.lang.String... jarFiles)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates new ScalaShellRemoteEnvironment that has a reference to the FlinkILoop.
        参数:
        host - The host name or address of the master (JobManager), where the program should be executed.
        port - The port of the master (JobManager), where the program should be executed.
        flinkILoop - The flink Iloop instance from which the ScalaShellRemoteEnvironment is called.
        clientConfig - The configuration used by the client that connects to the cluster.
        jarFiles - The JAR files with code that needs to be shipped to the cluster. If the program uses user-defined functions, user-defined input formats, or any libraries, those must be provided in the JAR files.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
